Package model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
model.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Parent class for all pieces in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean enpassant
    boolean to keep track of the piece's ability to be captured in an enpassant move.
    boolean hasMoved
    boolean to keep track of if the piece has moved or not.
    boolean isWhite
    boolean to keep track of the piece's color.
    java.lang.String type
    string that represents the type of the piece.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for a piece object.

    setter method for this piece's hasMoved attribute.

      boolean to keep track of the piece's color.

      string that represents the type of the piece.

    • hasMoved

      boolean to keep track of if the piece has moved or not.

    • enpassant

      public boolean enpassant
      boolean to keep track of the piece's ability to be captured in an enpassant move.

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece​(java.lang.String color)
      Constructor for a piece object.
      Parameters:
      color - string representing the color of the piece. "white" if the piece belongs to the white team, "black" if it belongs to the black team.

  • Method Details

    • isWhite

      public boolean isWhite()
      getter method for this piece's color.
      Returns:
      true if the piece is white, false if the piece is black.

    • hasMoved

      public boolean hasMoved()
      getter method for this piece's hasMoved attribute.
      Returns:
      true if the piece has been moved in the chess game, false if the piece has not moved.

    • moved

      public void moved()
      setter method for this piece's hasMoved attribute. Called when a piece has been moved from it's original position.

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      getter method for this piece's type.
      Returns:
      string representation of the piece's type. null if the piece does not have a type.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      returns the piece's color and its type in a string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      string representation of the piece.
